Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at 869 W Buena.
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Sheridan, Irving Park and Broadway due to fire department activity near 869 W Buena.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Sheridan, Irving Park and Broadway due to fire department activity near 869 W Buena.

Allow extra travel time.
